Uses of Class
org.asteroid.math.Matrix

Packages that use Matrix
Package
Description
org.asteroid.math
Contains classes to perform calculation

  • Uses of Matrix in org.asteroid.math

    Methods in org.asteroid.math that return Matrix
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Matrix
    Matrix.add(Matrix matrix)
    Adds given instance of matrix in argument and current instance of matrix and returns a new instance of class Matrix containing the result
    Matrix
    Matrix.clone()
    Generates a copy of the current instance of matrix
    Matrix
    Matrix.elementaryTransform(boolean transformRow, int rcm, int rcn, double scalar)
    Performs elementary transformation on the given Matrix
    CASE 1: if transformRow is true then it performs Rₘ → Rₘ + cRₙ where rcm represents the value of Rₘ, rcn represents the value of Rₙ and scalar represents the value of c
    CASE 2: if transformRow is false then it performs Cₘ → Cₘ + cCₙ where rcm represents the value of Cₘ, rcn represents the value of Cₙ and scalar represents the value of c
    Matrix
    Matrix.getAdjoint()
    Calculates and return adjoint matrix of current instance of matrix
    Matrix
    Matrix.getInverse()
    Generates the inverse of the current instance of matrix and returns a new instance of class Matrix containing the result
    Matrix
    Matrix.getMinorMatrix(int row, int col)
    Generates a matrix excluding the row and matrix of current instance of matrix
    Matrix
    Matrix.geTranspose()
    Generates and return geTranspose of the current instance of matrix
    Matrix
    Matrix.interchange(boolean interchangeRows, int rc1, int rc2)
    Returns a new instance of matrix with an interchange in two row or column.
    Matrix
    Matrix.multiply(double num)
    Multiply a scalar value with the current instance of class and returns a new instance of class Matrix containing the result
    Matrix
    Matrix.multiply(Matrix matrix)
    Multiplies current instance of matrix with the instance of matrix given in the argument and returns a new instance of class Matrix containing the result
    Matrix
    Matrix.subtract(Matrix matrix)
    Subtract the given instance of matrix in argument from current instance of matrix and returns a new instance of class Matrix containing the result
